recipe_name: Chocolate fudge sponge pudding with hot chocolate sauce
author: Phil Vickery
method: Cream the butter and sugar together in a mixing bowl until pale and fluffy.  Gradually mix in the beaten egg, then the milk and finally the flour.  Grease a microwaveable bowl with butter. Place the fudge and chocolate into the bowl. Spoon the sponge mixture on top and microwave for about 4-5 minutes on full power.  Meanwhile, for the chocolate sauce, heat the chocolate and cream together in a pan over a low heat, stirring continuously until combined. Turn the sponge pudding out onto a plate and serve drizzled with the hot chocolate sauce.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz butter, plus extra for greasing,  100g/3½oz caster sugar,  2 free-range eggs, beaten,  2 tbsp milk,  100g/3½oz self-raising flour,  55g/2oz ready-made fudge, broken into pieces,  55g/2oz dark chocolate, broken into pieces,  85g/3oz dark chocolate,  150ml/5fl oz double cream
